cont.entity_a: Setup was simple, and file transfer was adequate.
cont.entity_b: Portable, reliable, and simple to use.

cont.entity_a: Device had a noise that suggested inadequate QA process.
Backup software included is awkward to use and not very configurable.
cont.entity_b: Comes with free backup software that is frequently used.

cont.entity_a: Fairly small and very quiet. Has a sleek design and one-touch backup feature.
cont.entity_b: Small, light, and requires no external power. Nice looking and fast.

cont.entity_a: Fairly inexpensive with fast response time and reliable performance.
Requires a separate power supply, which some find inconvenient. The product is economical but requires an external power source.
cont.entity_b: The USB model doesn't work well with some Mac laptops due to insufficient power. Small, light, and requires no external power.
Portable, reliable, and simple to use.

cont.entity_a: The drive works quietly and doesn't get very warm.
The drive can be used for data backup and is generally stable.
cont.entity_b: Great for backing up pictures and music files on Windows XP.

cont.entity_a: The drive's size is larger than expected, making it less portable.
cont.entity_b: Small, light, and requires no external power.

cont.entity_a: Some units have issues with reliability and durability.
cont.entity_b: Some units are unreliable and do not work with iMac. Died shortly after use, but full refund was provided by Amazon.

cont.entity_a: Some users reported difficulty with customer service and technical support.
cont.entity_b: Return policy is fast and easy, with UPS pickup.

cont.entity_a: Offers good storage space for the price, but lacks a Kensington lock slot.
cont.entity_b: Storage capacity is suitable for backup of music and personal records.
The USB model doesn't work well with some Mac laptops due to insufficient power. SmartDisk USB line doesn't work properly with Mac laptops.
Does not have a Firewire port as expected.
Does not come with a cover. Lacks short USB cable and better indicator light.
